channel.title: How to fix Trading in ZDR?
channel.description: If anyone knows how to make it so you dont gotta go in trade center for ZDR please post or give me the link for a tut thanks.

Come here baby!

item.title: How to fix Trading in ZDR?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

He/she said “please post OR give a tut” so techinically its allowed.

To fix it, go through your client.java, change:

case 128: // Trade Request if (InTradeArea == true) { WanneTradeWith = inStream.readUnsignedWord(); WanneTrade = 1; } else if (InTradeArea == false) { sendMessage("You must be in trading center to trade."); } break;

and this:

[code]
case 139: // Duel/trade answer

        if (InTradeArea == true) {
            WanneTradeWith = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
            WanneTrade = 2;
        } else if (InTradeArea == false) {
            sendMessage("You must be in trading center to trade.");
        }[/code]

Im sure you can figure it out from there, cant have you being spoon fed can we.

Read full topic
item.source: How to fix Trading in ZDR?
